channel.title: calendar on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in calendar on Rusland 1

item.title: Russian New Year (Новый год) and the First Encounter
item.description: Begin = continuation Linked to New Year is a Russian saying (in the realm of superstition ) that can sound both motivating and ominous. Как встретишь Новый год (How you begin/meet the New Year), так его и проведёшь (is how it will go).

item.title: September 1st: Knowledge Day
item.description: Russia Then and Now – September 1st – Knowledge Day in Russia (WestfordCAT, 2019, 7 m) Приколы 1 сентября (September 1st Jokes) (Пулька Папулька, 2018, 4 m) Great Insight in First Day of School for Russia’s First Graders(RBTH, 11 m)
